parameter.name: Database name
parameter.descr: The name of a database to create

parameter.name: Database server
parameter.descr: Host which has the database server running (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's path (usually /tmp), or leave this fiend empty)

parameter.name: Port
parameter.descr: Database server port (for servers running on unix domain sockets, enter the socket's file name extension (usually 5432), or leave this fiend empty)

parameter.name: Use SSL to connect
parameter.descr: Whether to require SSL or not when connecting
